Uses of Package
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities

Packages that use com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
Package
Description
com.github.hanyaeger.api
Classes and packages that are part of the public API of Yaeger.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to entities and their behaviour.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl
All (abstract) implementations of YaegerEntity that can be used on a YaegerScene.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes
All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to scenes.
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.factories
 
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities used by com.github.hanyaeger.api
    Class
    Description
    EntitySpawner
    An EntitySpawner is the abstract superclass that should be extended to create an object that spawns a subclass of YaegerEntity.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
    Class
    Description
    Collider
    A Collider represents an YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a Collided
    CompositeEntity
    When a group of entities are combined to create a single YaegerEntity, they are a composition and this class should be used to perform that composition.
    ContinuousRotatable
    When implementing this Interface, a YaegerEntity will acquire the behaviour to perform a rotation on each Game World update, and thus give the illusion of a continuous rotation.
    Direction
    Convenience enum for setting the Direction.
    Rotatable
    Implementing this interface will result in de availability of the Rotatable.setRotate(double) method.
    YaegerEntity
    A YaegerEntity is the base class for all things that can be drawn on a YaegerScene.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl
    Class
    Description
    ContinuousRotatable
    When implementing this Interface, a YaegerEntity will acquire the behaviour to perform a rotation on each Game World update, and thus give the illusion of a continuous rotation.
    Rotatable
    Implementing this interface will result in de availability of the Rotatable.setRotate(double) method.
    YaegerEntity
    A YaegerEntity is the base class for all things that can be drawn on a YaegerScene.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes

    Description
    EntitySpawner
    An EntitySpawner is the abstract superclass that should be extended to create an object that spawns a subclass of YaegerEntity.
    YaegerEntity
    A YaegerEntity is the base class for all things that can be drawn on a YaegerScene.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities used by com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities
    Class
    Description
    Collided
    A Collided is a YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a Collider.
    Collider
    A Collider represents an YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a Collided
    Rotatable
    Implementing this interface will result in de availability of the Rotatable.setRotate(double) method.
    YaegerEntity
    A YaegerEntity is the base class for all things that can be drawn on a YaegerScene.
